actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend the survivor benefit plan provided for under title 10 of the Unites States Code to eliminate the annuity reduction made, in order to provide a surviving spouse with an annuity, during periods when the annuitant is not married.

summary.text: Declares that annuity reductions for retired Armed Forces personnel made pursuant to the provisions of the Survivor Benefit Plan in order to provide a surviving spouse with an annuity shall not be made during periods when the retiree is not married.

titles.title: A bill to amend the survivor benefit plan provided for under title 10 of the Unites States Code to eliminate the annuity reduction made, in order to provide a surviving spouse with an annuity, during periods when the annuitant is not married.
